name: 楊元森
objective:
這是大學部學生的第二門程式語言課程，將銜接基礎的計算機概論。 本課程將講授以C/C++做程式基本輸入，輸出，分支，迴圈，陣列，字串，指標，函式，遞迴，演算法練習，與基本物件導向概念。

歡迎同學自備筆記型電腦來上課。對於使用桌上型電腦的同學，本課程亦提供操作錄影影片供同學回家仿做。

本課程需要同學習慣於大量使用鍵盤。建議同學在修課之前熟悉正確的鍵盤指法並提升英文打字速度。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Computing and Programming
Week 2: Concepts of operations, math functions, branching (IF)
      (SIN, COS, TAN, MOD, EXP, LOG, ABS, SQRT, IF, MAX, MIN, ROUND, CEILING, FLOOR, AND, OR, NOT, ...) (Exercises 3.19, 3.20)
Week 3: Exercises
Week 4: Match, index, applications to surveying and cost tables
Week 5: I/O and basic operations (cout, cin, int, double): HW: 2.19 

Week 3: Selections (if, else, bool, boolean opeartors) (Ch. 3)
Week 4: Loops (while, do-while, for) (Ch. 4)
Week 5: Loops (break, continue) (Ch. 4)
Week 6: Function Basics (declare, return, arguments) (Ch. 5)
Week 7: Single-dimensional Arrays (Ch. 7)
Week 8: Midterm Simulation
Week 9: Midterm 
Week 10: Multi-dimensional Arrays (Ch. 8)
Week 11: Multi-dimensional Arrays (Ch. 8)
Week 12: Objects and Classes (Ch. 9)
Week 13: Pointers and dynamic memory (Ch. 11)
Week 14: File Input and Output (Ch. 13)
Week 15: Recursion (Ch. 17) 
Week 16: Off (Dragon Boat Festival) 
Week 17: Final Simulation
Week 18: Final
